lead_paragraph: The Baltimore Orioles and Oakland Athletics will play a split doubleheader Saturday after Friday night's game was postponed by rain.

headline.print_headline: Athletics-Orioles Game Postponed, to Be Played as Split DH
headline.main: Athletics-Orioles Game Postponed, to Be Played as Split DH

snippet: The Baltimore Orioles and Oakland Athletics will play a split doubleheader Saturday after Friday night's game was postponed by rain....
